entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023
